articles.title: BPCL to pay shareholders from Rs 9,876 cr Numaligarh Refinery stake sale - Economic Times
articles.description: The Board of BPCL on Monday approved the sale of the company's 61.65 per cent stake in Numaligarh Refinery Ltd (NRL) to a consortium of state-owned Oil India, consultancy firm Engineers India Ltd (EIL) and Government of Assam for Rs 9,875.96 crore.
articles.content: NEW DELHI: Privatisation-bound (BPCL) may use Rs 9,876 crore proceed from stake sale in Numaligarh Refinery to pay a special dividend to shareholders, the biggest being Government of India, BPCL dire… [+4947 chars]
